artist: Engraver: Antoine-Jean Duclos; Artist: After Jean-Michel Moreau le Jeune
description: male and a female figure embracing right foreground; second female figure with spear and sheild flying above; numerous putti at left, one with arrows; round open sided building at far left
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet in black below image: [J.M. Moreau, Le jeune, invenit.    1777   A.J. Duclos, Scuplsit/ AIDE\' de la fageffe, on fauve de l\'amour dans les bras de la raison]; in pencil on sheet: [2-92]
title: Aide' de la fageffe, on fe fauve de l'amour dans les bras de la raison
